root: ^Do you have anything more creative to make me talk?
^Violence can be very creative, belive me
^Until you start talking, this won't move forward

c-0: ^Well, I won't try to inspire you then.
c-1: ^But I am talking with you. I am a very talkative person. You must agree with me.

c-0: ^Well, you repeat adjectives all the time, but I don't emphasize it.
c-1: ^Not my fault you don't watch your words.
^Don't change your mind every second, you just said you wanted me to talk

proposition: ^I will tell you everything, if you manage to make me laugh.
^You smirk all the time, you think you won't laugh the moment you will think that I'm stupid.

c-0: ^You ARE stupid. I have selfcontrol hon. It's not that unique of a skill.
